summary: This spell gives you the ability to change the weather.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Weather Spell
Version: 1.2
Date: 12/26/2014
Category: Magic - Spells & enchantments
Author: malli

Description
===========
This mod adds a spell tome which teaches you a weather spell. It can be found on the bar table in the Sleeping Giant Inn at Riverwood.
The following weather conditions are available:
clear (optional aurora at night)
cloudy (optional aurora at night)
fog
rain
snow
thunderstorm
snow storm
Sovngarde bright
Sovngarde dark
Blackreach
Bloated Man's Grotto fog

Apocrypha
volcanic ash clear (optional aurora at night)
volcanic ash cloudy (optional aurora at night)
volcanic ash snow
eclipse
Soul Cairn

normal weather ==> sets the weather back to its default state

Changelog
=========
1.2 (12/30/2014)
Added Bloated Man's Grotto fog

1.1 (12/29/2014) Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLCs required
New weathers from Dawnguard and Dragonborn.
New option to display auroras at night.
Added error message if spell is used indoors.

1.0 (12/26/2014)
First implementation.

Install
=======
1. Copy the Weather Spell.esp and the script folder to your Skyrim Data folder. Or use NexusModManager for simple installation.
2. Start Skyrim Launcher, click 'Data Files', place a checkmark beside the Weather Spell.esp file.

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the Weather Spell.esp file.
2. Delete the Weather Spell.esp file from your Skyrim Data folder
3. Delete WeatherScript.pex from Data/Scripts folder.
4. Delete WeatherScript.psc from Data/Scripts/source folder.

Or just deaktivate the mod in NMM.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
I've not found any bugs.
Please contact me if you find any.

Licensing/Legal
===============
You have to contact me before you do anything with this mod.

Contact
=======
You can find me on NexusMods as 'malli'
author: Sheo aka malli
